# archestra_role (Data Source)

Fetches an Archestra role by name.

**⚠️ Backend API Limitation**: This data source is currently blocked because the backend does not expose role lookup endpoints. The schema is defined and ready, but read operations will fail with a clear error message until the backend APIs are available.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up a system or custom role by name
# Note: This data source requires backend API support for role queries
data "archestra_role" "admin" {
  name = "admin"
}

# Use the role in a user role assignment
resource "archestra_user_role_assignment" "example" {
  user_id = "user-123"
  role_id = data.archestra_role.admin.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role to look up

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the role
- `id` (String) Role identifier
- `permissions` (List of String) List of permissions granted by this role
